white: Being an insane person and insinuating yourself into Todd's life.
The fundamental interconnectedness of all things.
Todd's crazy drug dealer landlord, Dorian.
Simon and Cynthia Draycott, advertising executives.
A bed in the wall that leads to the magical world of Wendimor.
Chasing a rabbit around a field for 7 hours straight.
Saving the human race from extinction, for no extra charge.
All five members of the Rowdy 3.
Doing fortune telling in drag every Thursday evening in the back garden of a pub.
A sofa wedged impossibly stuck in a stairway.
Killing a guy by making him cross the street.
A time machine that only works using lightbulbs.
Letting a crazy stranger into your van.
Faking a hereditary disease so you don't have to get a job.
Feeding off of the emotions of weirdos.
The Mage's army of Kellum knights.
The rhyme of the ancient mariner.
Getting into a van with a bunch of crazy strangers.
Using magic to make everything better.
A piece of Software that turns spreadsheets into music.
Writing a hit song which is later played on repeat at a murder scene.
Avoiding a terrible incident from your childhood for 50 years, only to one day randomly stumble upon people investigating it in the diner you work at.
The sacred forrest of the Bofuki Nepoo.
Being able to kill anyone at will.
A long, dark Tea-time of the soul.
Simon Black, father of the year.
An article about fractal landscapes in Fathom magazine.
Lots and lots of dead bodies.
A girl who can recite yesterday's stock market.
Doing a lot of things without thinking, and then almost instantly regretting it.
Predicting exam results in your sleep.
Getting stuck in a time loop where you can't change anything because it's already happened.
An infinite universe with an unknowable plan for everyone.
Homeless people who are actually norse gods.
A one-eyed, one-horned, flyin' purple people eater.
Trading a flashy corvette for a jeep.
Lying to your client that you're on your way to meet them, when in reality you've only just woken up.
Eating a cheese tasting in a convenience store.
Dirk's many brightly coloured leather jackets.
Eating copious amounts of pizza whilst driving an expensive sportscar at high speed.
An alien ghost from the dawn of time who wants to undo the human race from existence.
Realising that your sister actually has the terrible disease you've been faking for years.
Hot Potato (Don't pick it up, pick it up).
Todd's stupid drawing of a cowboy.
Turning into a bug, but only emotionally.
Watching TV, but only for the adverts.
Following someone who looks like they know where they're going.
